description:
Welcome to Fantasy News with Daniel Greene, where we dive into the latest updates from the worlds of fantasy, sci-fi, and publishing. This week’s episode is packed with breaking stories, from AI controversies, major movie updates, epic book announcements, and Kickstarter campaigns: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/wraithmarked/saphira?ref=discovery&term=eragon&total_hits=4&category_id=47  Don’t forget to check out the timestamps below and grab some merch at danielbgreene.com! 🎉

Second channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC-EqiFg67s2Nd0imgRXg5w

title: Harper Collins Sells Its Authors to AI🤖 NEW Stephen King Book!🤡 & MORE! ~FN~
